d994b873-e303-49d9-abf5-8c62a0e23009.description: To show young people what makes a good neighbour and how this benefits their tenancy.
d994b873-e303-49d9-abf5-8c62a0e23009.name: Being a Good Neighbour

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Being a Good Neighbour tasks 1-5 in the Home & Living Alone booklet.

fa479cc4-f13f-44d2-a647-2d967b5b6396.description: Young people who worked with us to identify a list of badges wanted to know more about drink spiking. The purpose of this badge is to help you avoid being spiked and learn what to do if you or a friend is spiked.
fa479cc4-f13f-44d2-a647-2d967b5b6396.name: Drink Spiking

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Drink Spiking tasks 1-5 in the Health & Wellbeing booklet.

440bc1ff-e849-44d5-99ca-fbef7c6b7b29.description: To know the signs of abuse in a relationship and where to find support.
440bc1ff-e849-44d5-99ca-fbef7c6b7b29.name: Abuse

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Abuse related tasks 1-4 in the Relationships workbook.

46003238-4b7d-4a0d-a8ee-e757c68275c7.description: By the end of this badge you will have an understanding of what addictive behaviours are, the effects they can have on you, what the risks are of addictive behaviours and how to get help if you need it.
46003238-4b7d-4a0d-a8ee-e757c68275c7.name: Addictive Behaviours

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Addictive Behaviours tasks 1-5 in your Health & Wellbeing booklet.

1d481f49-a954-4179-9ec3-2acace919db9.description: The purpose of this badge is to give you an understanding of what alcohol is, the effects it has on you, what the risks of using it are, how to manage the risks and how to get help if you need it.
1d481f49-a954-4179-9ec3-2acace919db9.name: Alcohol

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Alcohol tasks 1-5 in the Health & Wellbeing booklet.

101e79e1-1db4-40ba-87e2-47594f8c4ced.description: A badge helping you to prepare for leaving care.
101e79e1-1db4-40ba-87e2-47594f8c4ced.name: Am I A Care Leaver?

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Am I A Care Leaver tasks 1-4 in the Leaving Care booklet.

dadb11e2-2deb-4f16-9ab5-08219673b104.description: This badge looks at how anxiety can make you feel and how to get support.
dadb11e2-2deb-4f16-9ab5-08219673b104.name: Anxiety

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Anxiety related tasks 1-4 in the Mental Health booklet.

c67328af-dd5c-42c4-839f-f75a21f92885.description: A badge to explore whether you are ready to live on your own.
c67328af-dd5c-42c4-839f-f75a21f92885.name: Are you ready to move into your own place?

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Are You Ready to Move Into Your Own Place tasks 1-5 in the Leaving Care workbook.
Complete the Banking tasks 1-4 in the Home & Living Alone booklet.

c932b35f-6f99-41f8-b1dd-277ee81b2622.description: Know how to budget so you can make your money last and pay your bills until your next payment.
c932b35f-6f99-41f8-b1dd-277ee81b2622.name: Budgeting

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Budgeting tasks 1-4 in the Home & Living Along workbook.

fe611471-2510-4da4-bfff-e9fe10b928c8.description: The purpose of this badge is to give you an understanding of what cannabis is, the effects it has on you, what the risks of using it are, how to manage the risks and how to get help if you need it.
fe611471-2510-4da4-bfff-e9fe10b928c8.name: Cannabis

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Cannabis tasks 1-5 in the Health & Wellbeing booklet.

20f46643-f47d-4c4c-9517-bd27abb8b9d0.description: The purpose of this badge is to get an understanding of what cocaine is, the effects it has on you, what the risks of using it are, how to manage the risks and how to get help if you need it.
20f46643-f47d-4c4c-9517-bd27abb8b9d0.name: Cocaine

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Cocaine tasks 1-5 in the Health & Wellbeing booklet.

478ed684-d7a2-47e1-85dd-f358c00730b3.description: The purpose of this badge is to help you to think about what you would like to do in the future – College or Uni first and then a job. Would you like to do something like an apprenticeship first or go straight into work? Still not sure what to do or maybe just need a little help being pointed in the right direction, this badge can help!
478ed684-d7a2-47e1-85dd-f358c00730b3.name: College or Job?

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the College or Job tasks 1-5 in your Leaving Care booklet.

62f281b4-070b-4875-b1a9-7c06b885a157.description: Sexual consent means a person willingly agrees to have sex or engage in a sexual activity – and they are free and able to make their own decision.
62f281b4-070b-4875-b1a9-7c06b885a157.name: Consent

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Consent related tasks 1-4 in the Relationships workbook.

ec37edee-878d-46fe-83fa-a02251b40822.description: An important part of living independently is how to manage your money. Lots of people get into financial difficulty and this can result in borrowing, or debt. This badge is about learning how to avoid debt.
ec37edee-878d-46fe-83fa-a02251b40822.name: Debt Drama

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Debt Drama tasks numbered 1-4 in your Home & Living Alone booklet.

51f9e8ce-c1c9-4777-90b0-60bcba27d7e6.description: The purpose of this badge is to educate you about eating well on a budget. If you have done the budgeting badge you will know how much you have to spend on food per week.
51f9e8ce-c1c9-4777-90b0-60bcba27d7e6.name: Eat Well For Less

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Eat Well 4 Less tasks 1-4 in the Home & Living Alone booklet.

cfd2c144-16b3-455d-87c9-b3c26a686ff7.description: The purpose of this badge is to give you an understanding of ecstasy, the effects it has on you, what the risks of using it are, how to manage the risks and how to get help if you need it.
cfd2c144-16b3-455d-87c9-b3c26a686ff7.name: Ecstasy

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Ecstasy tasks 1-5 in the Health & Wellbeing booklet.

a73c7d1f-90d9-4656-bcb3-d64d858fbac8.description: A badge exploring the subjects of family and relationships.
a73c7d1f-90d9-4656-bcb3-d64d858fbac8.name: Family and Relationships

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Family and Relationships tasks 1-5 in your Leaving Care workbook.

7e8945c8-fdf2-4811-91db-fed51271c005.description: The purpose of this badge is to show you how to maintain your home, essentials you'll need to know and what to do in an emergency.
7e8945c8-fdf2-4811-91db-fed51271c005.name: Maintaining Your Home

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Maintaining Your Home tasks 1-5 in the Home & Living Alone booklet.

89cc349a-b424-40d2-a224-7dc52fc567d1.description: The purpose of this badge is so that you get a basic understanding and knowledge of what needs to happen before starting your tenancy. At the end of the badge, you should be able to: Identify important and non-important items when moving into a new place, Develop skills to help you live independently, Understand basic legal aspects of being a tenant and Know how to register with a doctor and dentist.
89cc349a-b424-40d2-a224-7dc52fc567d1.name: Moving in

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Moving In tasks 1-5 in your Home & Living Alone booklet.

fcc9be46-0462-4e4c-ad5b-cc9bd1de64d5.description: A badge to help plan your pathway after leaving care.
fcc9be46-0462-4e4c-ad5b-cc9bd1de64d5.name: My Pathway Plan

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the My Pathway Plan tasks 1-4 in your Leaving Care workbook.

acb424b2-78ba-4a30-93a1-390fac69fd10.description: This task is to educate you on NPS and create more of an awareness of what they are and the effects and risks of using them.
acb424b2-78ba-4a30-93a1-390fac69fd10.name: New Psychoactive Substances (NPS)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete NPS tasks 1-5 in your Health & Wellbeing booklet.

6f52d57d-d18a-41b1-b85a-c6f9a5b578fc.description: This badge looks at Self-Harm and where you can get support.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Self Harm related tasks 1-4 in the Mental Health workbook.

5e5be8fc-4a38-4503-a144-4cb6154718dd.description: This badge looks at sexting in terms of the law and the dangers involved.
5e5be8fc-4a38-4503-a144-4cb6154718dd.name: Sexting

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Sexting related tasks 1-3 in the Relationships workbook.

d498698b-8ff3-4a0f-850a-0aa5727a964a.description: This task is to educate you on Smoking & E-Cigarettes and create more of an awareness of what they are and the effects and risks of using them.
d498698b-8ff3-4a0f-850a-0aa5727a964a.name: Smoking & E-Cigs

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Smoking and Ecigs tasks 1-5 in your Health & Wellbeing booklet.

1433ec3c-23ed-4f0c-acb6-c2ec1000d0fc.description: This badge highlights the positive and negative uses of Social Media.
1433ec3c-23ed-4f0c-acb6-c2ec1000d0fc.name: Social Media

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Social Media tasks 1-4 in the Me Time workbook.

64f858b0-3980-441f-8a19-31cc6ac3436f.description: This badge looks at how sport can have positive physical, mental and social affects.
64f858b0-3980-441f-8a19-31cc6ac3436f.name: Sport

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Sport tasks 1-4 in the Me Time workbook.

d476a0b1-8bfb-4dc2-b886-2839f88e79ce.description: A badge exploring your housing options after leaving care.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the What Are My Housing Options tasks 1-5 in the Leaving Care workbook.

c88138e7-5293-4af7-9421-1d8075323abc.description: Looking at how you perceive what a home is and how you class homelessness.
